thread.title: wonderfully efficient and great location
thread.title_full: wonderfully efficient and great location - Review of Le Placide, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Margaret C
title: wonderfully efficient and great location
text:
Le Placide has a wonderful location and they seemed to anticipate our every need with the room amenities. It was clean and tidy and fresh in appearance. We felt very welcome and would recommend it to anyone. We would definitely stay there on our next trip to Paris. The building was old and quaint, but wonderfully modern at the same time. The best of both worlds.
Room Tip: We were on the second floor. It was perfect (street view and courtyard view, too) See more room tips
